name: DMS Systems
overview: DMS Systems Corp. provides integrated warehouse management systems, enterprise resource planning, and supply chain management solutions for automotive, HD truck, RV, marine parts, and other hard-goods distributors in the United States and internationally. The companyâ€™s solutions include Distribution/Express System, an integrated customer, inventory, and financial management system designed for single and multi-site retail and wholesale distributors; Qwik-Look, a business intelligence application that provides user access to data about operational and financial performance; DX-CRM that allows users to access performance metrics and information about customers; and Dx portal, a single screen portal for corporate business activities. It also offers Qwik-Scan, a wireless warehouse bar coding system; Qwik-Cat, an auto parts and light/medium truck cataloging system; Qwik-Clock, an application that reduces payroll preparation time by eliminating errors resulting from manual time sheet or time card calculations; Qwik-Track, a scheduling tool that facilitates conflict determination for vacations and leaves, as well as provides daily staffing entry and reporting requirements; and Command Center, which gives the information to make course corrections. In addition, the company provides Document Center, a customer and supplier laser form documents management solution; and servers, bar coding, terminals, and peripheral products. Further, it offers on-premise and on-demand hosted applications, as well as develops and manages e-commerce Websites for its distributors and their customers. DMS Systems Corp. was founded in 1986 and is based in Rocky Mount, North Carolina. It has sales and support offices in Raleigh, North Carolina; Wilmington, Delaware; Cleveland, Ohio; and Boca Raton, Florida.

relationships.title: New Business Development & Implementation Team Manager
